info.title: Minimal test specification
info.description:
Specification where some operations do not define request parameters of their own, and where it's expected that all operations will 'inherit' parameters from their respective Path Objects.
See https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.3#parameter-object

/path-with-params/{PathPathParam}.summary: Path Item defining some parameters of its own.

parameters.name: PathPathParam
parameters.description: Path parameter defined as path variable.

parameters.name: PathQueryParam
parameters.description: Path parameter expected as a query parameter.

parameters.name: PathHeaderParam
parameters.description: Path parameter expected as a header.

parameters.name: PathCookieParam
parameters.description: Path parameter expected as a cookie.

get.summary: Path with params: Operation with no parameters.
get.description: Operation with no parameters of its own. Expectation: result should contain just path's parameters.

post.summary: Path with params: Operation with non-overlapping parameters.
post.description: Operation with some parameters of its own, none overlapping with the path one. Expectation: result should contain all path's and operation's parameters.

parameters.name: OperationQueryParamPost
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a query parameter.

parameters.name: OperationHeaderParamPost
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a header.

parameters.name: OperationCookieParamPost
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a cookie.

put.summary: Path with params: Operation with overlapping parameters.
put.description: Operation with some parameters of its own but also with params overriding the path ones. Expectation: result should contain all path's and operation's parameters, with definitions at the operation levels winning over their counterparts at the path level.

parameters.name: PathPathParam
parameters.description: Path parameter defined as path variable - re-defined in the operation.

parameters.name: PathQueryParam
parameters.description: Path parameter expected as a query parameter - re-defined in the operation.

parameters.name: PathHeaderParam
parameters.description: Path parameter expected as a header - re-defined in the operation.

parameters.name: PathCookieParam
parameters.description: Path parameter expected as a cookie - re-defined in the operation.

parameters.name: OperationQueryParamPut
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a query parameter.

parameters.name: OperationHeaderParamPut
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a header.

parameters.name: OperationCookieParamPut
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a cookie.

/path-with-no-params/{PathPathParam}.summary: Path Item defining no parameters of its own.

get.summary: Path with no params: Operation with no parameters.
get.description: Operation with no parameters of its own. Expectation: result should contain no parameters.

post.summary: Path with no params: Operation with parameters.
post.description: Operation with some parameters of its own. Expectation: result should contain all operation's parameters.

parameters.name: PathPathParam
parameters.description: Path parameter defined as path variable.

parameters.name: OperationQueryParamPost
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a query parameter.

parameters.name: OperationHeaderParamPost
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a header.

parameters.name: OperationCookieParamPost
parameters.description: Operation parameter expected as a cookie.
